name.baseName: Municipal sludge treatment and disposal;thickened sludge total solid concentration of 5%;anaerobic digestion
市政污泥处理与处置;浓缩污泥 总固体浓度5%;厌氧消化

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The VS/TS of the feedstock was set at four levels including 40%, 50%, 60%, and 70%. The four types of feedstock were assumed to have the same elementary composition (C: 45.1%; H: 7.6%; O: 38.8%; N: 6.8%; S: 1.4%; based on VS).
此外，将原料的VS/TS设定为40%、50%、60%和70% 4个水平。假设四种原料具有相同的元素组成(C: 45.1%;H: 7.6%;O: 38.8%;N:6.8%;S: 1.4%;基于VS)。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit was 1 t TS of thickened sludge, and all the input and output data were adapted to per unit (t TS)， total solid concentration of 5%.

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The heat generated from the combined heat and power (CHP) system of the biogas is first supplied to anaerobic digestion, and the residual heat (only when treating high organic content sludge) is used for thermal drying.
沼气热电联产(CHP)系统产生的热量首先供给厌氧消化，余热(仅在处理高有机含量污泥时)用于热干燥。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The data set represents the treatment and disposal of municipal sludge through a process which includes thickening the sludge to a total solid concentration of 5% followed by anaerobic digestion. This data is applicable primarily to waste management facilities involved in processing and stabilizing municipal sludge for either further use or final disposal.
该数据集代表了市政污泥的处理和处置过程，该过程包括将污泥浓缩至总固体浓度5%，然后进行厌氧消化。这些数据主要适用于处理和稳定市政污泥以供进一步使用或最终处置的废物管理设施。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Li, H. & Feng, K. Life cycle assessment of the environmental impacts and energy efficiency of an integration of sludge anaerobic digestion and pyrolysis. Journal of Cleaner Production 195, 476–485 (2018).

Li, H. & Feng, K. Life cycle assessment of the environmental impacts and energy efficiency of an integration of sludge anaerobic digestion and pyrolysis. Journal of Cleaner Production 195, 476–485 (2018).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this data should ensure its application within the context of municipal sludge management and should note the specific parameters of the process, including the total solid concentration level of 5%. It’s important to consider the technological applicability of this data to similar waste treatment setups and to adhere to any local regulations or standards when utilizing it. Additionally, if adapting this data beyond the scope of municipal sludge, users must carefully consider the changes in efficiencies or outputs within different treatment contexts.
使用此数据的用户应确保其应用于市政污泥管理的上下文中，并应注意工艺的特定参数，包括5%的总固体浓度水平。重要的是要考虑这些数据对类似废物处理设置的技术适用性，并在使用时遵守任何当地法规或标准。此外，如果将此数据适用于市政污泥范围之外，用户必须仔细考虑在不同处理上下文中效率或产出的变化。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: The functional unit was 1 t TS of thickened sludge, and all the input andoutput data were adapted to per unit (t TS)， total solid concentration of 5%.
功能单元为1 t TS浓缩污泥，所有输入和输出数据适应每单位（t TS），总固体浓度为5%。
